Package com.example.scandroid

Class DBAccessor

java.lang.Object
com.example.scandroid.DBAccessor
public class DBAccessor extends Object
Represents interface between scANDROID and Firestore database.

  • Constructor Details

    • DBAccessor

      public DBAccessor()
      Sole constructor of DBAccessor.
      Contains all access to Firestore Database.
      DB's: Events, EventPosters, ImageAssets, QRCodes, Users, and UserProfileImages
      Actions permitted: Access(get), Delete, and Store(update)

    • storeEventPoster

      public void storeEventPoster(String EventID, android.graphics.Bitmap EventPoster)
      DBAccessor.EventPosterDBAccessor.storeEventPoster(String, Bitmap) Get the data from an ImageView as bytes
      imageView.setDrawingCacheEnabled(true);
      imageView.buildDrawingCache();
      Bitmap bitmap = ((BitmapDrawable) imageView.getDrawable()).getBitmap();
      Parameters:
      EventID - Unique identifier for EventPoster to be accessed
      EventPoster - Bitmap of EventPoster to be stored.
